original_text: Jacob heard that Laban's sons were complaining about him. They were saying, ‘Jacob has taken everything that belonged to our father. He has taken things from our father and he has become rich himself.’
korean_text: 야곱이 라반의 아들들이 하는 말을 들은즉 야곱이 우리 아버지의 소유를 다 빼앗고 우리 아버지의 소유로 말미암아 이 모든 재물을 모았다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: Jacob heard that Laban's sons were complaining about him.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 라반의 아들들이 자신에 대해 불평하고 있다는 것을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Jacob has taken everything that belonged to our father.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 우리 아버지에게 속한 모든 것을 가져갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He has taken things from our father
and he has become rich himself.
